text_en: If a child is observed when playing with other children, the way of communication can reveal hearing impairments.
text_sw: Kama mtoto anachunguzwa anapo cheza na watoto wengine, njia ya kuwasiliana inaweza kudhihirisha udhaifu katika uwezo wa kusikia.

text_en: The childs gestures can detect hearing loss.
text_sw: Ishara kwa kutumia viungo vya mwili huweza kuashiria matatizo ya usikivu.

text_en: Visual representations of objects can make the learning of signs easier.
text_sw: Matumizi ya vitu vinavyoonekana kwenye ufundishaji yanaweza kufanya ujifunzaji wa alama kuwa mwepesi.
Marafiki wema hufanya mawasiliano kuwa rahisi

text_en: Having classmates who understand sign language is crusial.
text_sw: Kuwa na wanafunzi wenza wanaofahamu lugha ya alama ni muhimu.

text_en: The classmate can then respond adequately.
text_sw: Mwanafunzi mwenza huweza kujibu kwa kiwango cha kutosha.
